name: ISDA Master Agreement (92 or 2002 version)
use_case: Extraction of clauses, datapoints and management of amendments for ISDA master agreements
description: Schedule of an ISDA Master Agreement (92 or 2002 version)
prompt_scope_filter: Filter the schedule of the ISDA Master Agreement. Ignore any sections outside the schedule (standard pre-print, CSA annexes, etc.)
prompt_scope_amendment: Identify and manage amendments within the schedule of the ISDA Master Agreement. Ignore any amendments outside the schedule (Credit Support Annex, etc.).
